analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0xf27dc3916941656073e8642b014a8c7f6e483fba.sol:
	Contract Shopereum has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0xf27dc3916941656073e8642b014a8c7f6e483fba.sol#223)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0xf27dc3916941656073e8642b014a8c7f6e483fba.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
